name: Pho Ga Soup
author: Cora
summary: Vietnamese chicken noodle soup. After ordering this soup at a local Vietnamese restaurant, I decided to try to make it at home. This is a very flexible recipe. Feel free to substitute some of your favorite vegetables or try different noodles. Enjoy!
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package baby bella mushrooms, chopped
1 (6.75 ounce) package rice stick noodles (such as Maifun®)
1 dash Sriracha hot sauce, or more to taste
directions: Heat  vegetable oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat; saute onion, mushrooms, and garlic until tender, 5 to 10 minutes
Add water, rice noodles, and chicken bouillon to onion mixture; bring to a boil
Mix shredded chicken, green onions, and cilantro into soup; simmer for 5 minutes more
Transfer soup to serving bowls and top with bean sprouts, a squeeze of lime juice, and Sriracha hot sauce
